name: Om - Effortless text generation

screenshots.caption: random mode - 500 characters - upper & lower case

short_description: Om (pronounced as "Oh m") is a free command line tool for generating texts of different length & content. The data generated can be copied anywhere using Ctrl + v. Now no need to type characters to generate texts of fixed length. Just enter the count &  Om will generate no. of characters equal to count. The data generated can be copied anywhere using Ctrl+v. The User can generate characters in 4 different ways using 4 modes of Om. The user can provide options to generate lowercase, uppercase, numeric, other or any combination of above 4 character types. Om is extremely useful to testers & developers. Moreover Om comes with User Manual for complete guidance to its users.
summary: Command line tool for generating texts of different length & content.
